search_pharmacy_by_name: Select Name, POWER((POWER((Latitude-36.3361588500001),2)+POWER((Longitude-119.645667298),2)),0.5) AS Distance from Hospitals order by distance limit 5
search_hospital_by_name: Select Name from Hospitals order by POWER((POWER((Latitude-36.3361588500001),2)+POWER((Longitude-119.645667298),2)),0.5) limit 5
